main event: An unidentified aerial observation was reported at Scott Air Force Base, Illinois, on November 26, 1957, involving a solid reddish-orange object.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a dime ball at arm's length and cast an agitative movement before disappearing to the west., The observation lasted between 6 to 8 minutes., The sighting was conducted visually from the ground., The object was noted to perform a large 'U' turn during its flight., No photographs were available as evidence for this sighting.
witness description: A/2C Ronald W. Rious and A/2C Gareth L. Coley, both students at Communications School.
